landing.main-title: Boost the performance of your team
landing.sub-title: Coaches, handball coaches, collect statistics from your players during games, or practices

area-4.iphone: Coming soon on the App Store
area-4.title: Download Qaobee HB
area-4.content:
Qaobee HB allows the handball coach to collect and analyze the statistics of his players.
The application works on smartphone and tablet.

area-6.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
area-6.content: Stay informed about new features and Qaobee news

detail.team-subscribe: (*) You are a club and wish to subscribe to Qaobee for your coaches, contact us

standard.titleTarif: Qaobee HB is for coaches and clubs (<span style = "vertical-align: super; font-size: 50%;"> * </ span>) handball
standard.desc: The workspace you need to train with ease.

appWeb.title: Collect the statistics and consult them immediately
appWeb.intro: With the <b> Qaobee HB </ b> collection app, access your player or team stats in real time during a game. Argue your pre-match speech, during a timeout or at the half-time of a meeting.

teamWeb.title: Manage your players, teams, calendar
teamWeb.detail: <ul> <li> Add a new player, modify his / her information, consult his / her detailed record </ li> <li> Follow as many players as you like </ li> <li> Manage your teams in the same way </ li> <li> Plan friendly games, cup games, and league games </ li> </ ul>

agendaWeb.title: Plan your games
agendaWeb.detail: Schedule friendly games, cup games and championship games.

statsWeb.title: Analyze your statistics on our web application
statsWeb.detail:
By visiting our web application (qaobee.com), check the performances of your players game after game.
Efficiency in shooting, play time, attack, offensive and defensive contribution.
Take advantage of the comparison tools between players and between teams.
Enjoy the same features at your team level.

shareWeb.title: Collaborate and progress
shareWeb.intro: Share your squad with other coaches
shareWeb.item1Detail: Collaborate on the same squad, the same players, the same statistics and identify areas for team improvement
shareWeb.item2Title: Work on several people with other coaches
shareWeb.item2Detail: Invite other handball coaches to your space. Your collaborators can also share their space. Switch from one space to another with one click

standard.appMob: Collect the stats of your players

teamMob.title: Players
teamMob.detail: Add a player at the last minute. Consult the minimum data of your players.

agendaMob.title: Calendar
agendaMob.detail: Add or change a game quickly

collectMob.title: About fifty indicators at your disposal
collectMob.intro: Download our Qaobee HB app to your phone or tablet and start collecting your players' game actions during games

detail.shoot:
Identify the shooting preferences of your players by indicating the origin and the impact of their shots
For your goalkeepers, observe their strengths and their weak points by specifying the origin and the impact of the opponent shots
detail.attack:
Collect the positive and negative actions of your players during attack phases
Shift, decisive pass, force, walk, recovery, loss of ball ...
detail.defense:
Collect the positive and negative actions of your players during the defense phases
Against, interception, neutralization, misplacement, missed interception ...
detail.discipline:
Measure the aggressiveness and composure of your players
Yellow card, two minutes, red card
detail.status: Which are your most often titularized players, substitutes, their playing times, rotations ...

statsMob.title: View statistics in real time or after the game
statsMob.detail: <ul> <li> You can view the statistics of a match in real time </ li> <li> At any time, adapt your speech based on statistics collected data </ li> </ ul>

contact.title: Contact us
contact.title2: do not hesitate to contact us

pricing.descTarif: Benefit from a free trial month on all our offers

FREETRIAL.title: Free trial
FREETRIAL.features: Get all the features of our free application for a month

FREEMIUM.title: Individual
FREEMIUM.features: You want to measure the performance of your players.

TEAMS.title: Team S
TEAMS.features:
You are a group of 4 to 5 coaches or coaches from the same club or from different clubs.

You are a club that some coaches are interested in a solution to collect and analyze the performance of their players. br>
The Team S offer adapts to your needs by allowing you to create a Qaobee HB account with up to 5 users.

TEAMM.title: Team M
TEAMM.features: Analyze the performance, game after game, of your players, your teams.

TEAMXL.title: Team XL
TEAMXL.features: Share your workspace with your colleagues.

pricing.team-subscribe: (*) You are a club and wish to subscribe to Qaobee for your coaches, contact us

p1.title: We are QaoBee
p1.content: <b> QaoBee </ b> is a software company that develops and publishes digital solutions for the sports community. We are a group of Bretons who enjoy sport, new technologies, innovation, teamwork and building things we can be proud of. During the week, we come together to create innovative solutions to simplify and optimize the activity of sports directors.
